Docs.typeparam: The type of the input passed to the generator.
The type of the embedding instance produced by the generator.
Docs.summary: Represents a delegating embedding generator that configures a instance used by the remainder of the pipeline.

remarks.para: The callback may return , in which case a options will be passed to the next generator in the pipeline.

The provided implementation of is thread-safe for concurrent use so long as the employed configuration callback is also thread-safe for concurrent requests. If callers employ a shared options instance, care should be taken in the configuration callback, as multiple calls to it may end up running in parallel with the same options instance.

Docs.param: The delegate to invoke to configure the instance. It is passed a clone of the caller-supplied instance (or a newly constructed instance if the caller-supplied instance is ).
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified callback.
Docs.remarks: The delegate is passed either a new instance of if the caller didn't supply a instance, or a clone (via of the caller-supplied instance if one was supplied.
